title: Western Gothic - The Ballad of Utopia
description:
'Western Gothic - The Ballad of Utopia'

Devil's Due, 2011, 180 pages (this edition) 

Written by Barry Buchanan

Illustrated by Mike Hoffman

Barry Buchanan wrote it and Mike drew it, and if you like your Westerns with a touch of "creepy" thrown in, this tale of murder, supernatural magic, torture, drugs, whores 'n' gunplay is for you! The World's first Gothic Western!
